title: Launcher won't open
body: I just finished playing a game, and clicked the continue button. This is the part where the stats and data show up, but it didn't. So, I had to repoen the LoL launcher, right? I pressed icon, but it does nothing. If anybody could help with this technical issue, it would be very much appreciated. (I use a macbook air Yosemite).

replies.body:
When you're seeing an inconsistency in your client being able to function properly, it's typically caused by an unstable connection to the servers. Whenever your client disconnects from the servers, there's a good chance it will throw an error at you, or disappear completely. In this case, it sounds like at the time, your connection was poor and you disconnected from the pvp.net service. To ensure your connection to League is as stable as possible, I recommend you work through [our connection guide for mac](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#section-mac) as it goes over the most common fixes.

Let me know if you need help with any of these steps or have any questions.
